headline: Assistant Field Office Director at Immigration & Customs Enforcement, U.S. Department of Homeland Security

defaultPosition.description: As the Assistant Field Office Director for the Philadelphia Field Office within ICE's Office of Detention and Removal Operations (DRO) I facilitate the promotion of the public's safety and national security by ensuring the departure from the United States of all removable aliens through the fair and effective enforcement of the nationâs immigration laws.
